product_name: Timex Expedition Field Chrono Watch - Men's
long_description: The Timex Expedition Field Chrono Watch delivers a combination of chronograph functionality and outdoor sophistication. Chronograph measures minutes, seconds and 1/20th second. Easy-to-set date feature. INDIGLO night light; mineral glass crystal; genuine leather strap. The Timex Expedition Field Chrono Watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Expedition Field Chrono Watch delivers a combination of chronograph functionality and outdoor sophistication.
